name: Introduction to Digital Sustainability
description: Fundamentals of digital sustainability concepts and principles

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Define key concepts and principles of digital sustainability and their relevance to modern organizations.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the relationship between digital technologies and environmental, social, and economic sustainability.
learning_outcomes.skills: Analyze organizational practices for sustainability improvement opportunities using digital solutions.

name: Sustainability Frameworks and Standards
description: Overview of major sustainability frameworks, regulations, and standards
skills: Familiarity with frameworks like GRI, SDGs

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify major sustainability frameworks, standards, and regulations relevant to digital industries.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Compare different sustainability reporting frameworks and their application contexts.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply appropriate standards to evaluate organizational sustainability performance.

name: Data Analytics for Sustainability
description: Use data tools to derive actionable sustainability insights

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify data analysis methods suitable for sustainability contexts and challenges.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Evaluate tools and techniques for data-driven sustainability assessments.
learning_outcomes.skills: Use analytics tools to extract sustainability insights from complex datasets.

name: Machine Learning and Predictive Modeling
description: Develop predictive models to assess sustainability scenarios

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify machine learning techniques applicable to sustainability challenges.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain predictive modeling approaches for environmental and social impact forecasting.
learning_outcomes.skills: Develop and validate predictive models to support sustainability decision-making.

name: Sustainable Software Engineering
description: Implement sustainable programming practices and optimize code efficiency

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify energy-efficient coding practices and their environmental impact.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the relationship between software design choices and resource consumption.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement green coding principles to optimize software energy efficiency.

name: Systems Architecture for Sustainability
description: Design IT systems aligned with circular economy and low-impact principles

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Describe system architecture principles that support sustainability goals.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how system design decisions affect long-term sustainability performance.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design IT system architectures that minimize environmental footprint while maintaining functionality.

name: Ethics and Governance in Digital Innovation
description: Evaluate ethical implications of digital systems and ensure inclusive governance

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify ethical considerations in digital innovation for sustainability.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain governance frameworks that support responsible technology deployment.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply ethical principles to evaluate sustainability technologies and initiatives.

name: Work-based Sustainability Project
description: Apply sustainability knowledge in real-world workplace settings

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Recognize organizational contexts for sustainability project implementation.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain sustainability project management methodologies in workplace settings.
learning_outcomes.skills: Execute a sustainability initiative in a real-world professional environment.

name: Technical Implementation and Tool Support
description: Configure and maintain technical tools supporting sustainability goals

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify appropriate sustainability tools and technical implementation requirements.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain configuration approaches for sustainability monitoring platforms.
learning_outcomes.skills: Configure and maintain technical tools supporting organization-specific sustainability goals.

name: Circular Economy and Lifecycle Thinking
description: Analyze product lifecycles and propose circular redesign strategies

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Define circular economy principles and lifecycle assessment methodologies.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital technologies can enable circular business practices.
learning_outcomes.skills: Conduct product lifecycle analyses and propose circular redesign strategies.

name: Big Data for Environmental Intelligence
description: Leverage big data technologies to analyze environmental patterns and trends

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify big data technologies applicable to environmental monitoring and analysis.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how large-scale data processing can enhance environmental intelligence.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement big data solutions to process and analyze environmental datasets.

name: Advanced Visualisation for Sustainability Reporting
description: Create effective data visualizations to communicate sustainability performance

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify advanced visualization techniques for sustainability data communication.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how visual representations can effectively communicate sustainability metrics.
learning_outcomes.skills: Create compelling visual narratives of sustainability performance for diverse stakeholders.

name: Low-Carbon Cloud Infrastructure
description: Design and implement energy-efficient cloud computing solutions

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify cloud infrastructure components and their energy consumption patterns.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain strategies for reducing carbon footprint in cloud computing environments.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement and optimize low-carbon cloud infrastructure solutions.

name: Sustainable Digital Transformation Strategy
description: Develop holistic strategies for sustainability-focused digital transformation

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify components of digital transformation strategies aligned with sustainability goals.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the integration of sustainability principles into digital business strategies.
learning_outcomes.skills: Develop comprehensive digital transformation roadmaps that prioritize sustainability outcomes.

name: Applied Ethics in AI for Sustainability
description: Address ethical considerations in AI applications for sustainability challenges

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify ethical frameworks applicable to AI systems in sustainability contexts.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain potential ethical challenges in AI applications for environmental and social good.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply ethical principles to the design and evaluation of AI-driven sustainability solutions.

name: DevOps and Sustainable Deployment
description: Implement efficient and sustainable software deployment practices

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify DevOps practices that support sustainable software deployment.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how continuous integration/deployment affects resource efficiency.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement DevOps pipelines optimized for sustainability considerations.

name: Digital Circular Business Models
description: Design business models that leverage digital technologies for circular economy

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify digital business models that support circular economy principles.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital technologies enable resource efficiency and circular value chains.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design business models that leverage digital technologies for sustainability outcomes.

name: AI-Driven Environmental Risk Modelling
description: Apply AI and machine learning to model and mitigate environmental risks

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify AI methodologies applicable to environmental risk assessment.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how AI can enhance prediction and management of environmental risks.
learning_outcomes.skills: Develop AI-driven models to forecast and mitigate environmental impacts.

name: Sustainability Assessment and Benchmarking
description: Evaluate organizational sustainability performance against relevant benchmarks

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainability assessment methodologies and benchmarking frameworks.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain performance evaluation approaches for digital sustainability initiatives.
learning_outcomes.skills: Conduct comprehensive sustainability assessments and comparative benchmarking.

name: Data Ethics and Governance in Practice
description: Implement ethical data governance approaches for sustainability initiatives

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify data governance frameworks and ethical principles for sustainability data.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the practical challenges of implementing data ethics in sustainability contexts.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply data governance practices that ensure ethical use of sustainability information.

name: Energy-Efficient Software Architecture
description: Design software architectures optimized for energy efficiency

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify architectural patterns that promote energy efficiency in software systems.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the relationship between architecture decisions and long-term energy consumption.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design software architectures optimized for energy efficiency and sustainability.

name: Sustainable ICT Procurement and Policy

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainable procurement criteria for ICT equipment and services.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain policy frameworks that promote sustainable technology acquisition.
learning_outcomes.skills: Develop procurement policies that prioritize sustainability in ICT purchasing decisions.

name: Digital Twin and Smart Systems for Green Transition
description: Apply digital twin technology to model and optimize sustainable systems

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify digital twin technologies and smart systems applicable to sustainability challenges.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital twins can optimize resource use and support green transition.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement digital twin solutions to monitor and improve environmental performance.

name: Collaborative Tools for Green Innovation
description: Leverage collaborative platforms to drive sustainable innovation processes

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify collaborative digital tools that support sustainability innovation.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital collaboration can accelerate green innovation processes.
learning_outcomes.skills: Implement collaborative platforms to facilitate sustainability-focused innovation.

name: Digital Sustainability in SMEs
description: Work-based strategies to apply digital sustainability in small and medium-sized enterprises

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify the challenges and opportunities of implementing digital sustainability in SMEs.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Recognize appropriate digital tools and workflows to enhance sustainability in small business contexts.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply digital solutions in a real SME context to address sustainability issues.

name: AI for Sustainable Decision-Making
description: Using AI tools to support sustainability decisions in organizations

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify AI technologies that can assist with sustainability analysis and strategy development.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Evaluate AI-driven insights in the context of organizational sustainability goals.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply advanced AI models to assess sustainability outcomes and inform decision-making processes.

name: Green IT Service Management

learning_outcomes.understanding: Analyze IT service delivery in terms of energy efficiency and lifecycle impact.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design and manage IT services with minimized environmental footprint.

name: Strategic Digital Sustainability Leadership
description: Advanced work-based module on leading sustainability transitions using digital tools

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Synthesize frameworks for strategic leadership in digital sustainability at the executive level.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Critically evaluate approaches to integrating ESG, digital tools, and organizational change practices.
learning_outcomes.skills: Lead complex cross-functional sustainability initiatives using advanced digital technologies.

name: Blockchain for Sustainability Traceability
description: Explore the use of blockchain technology for traceable, transparent sustainability practices

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify blockchain principles and their application in sustainability traceability systems.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Evaluate how blockchain ensures transparency in sustainable supply chains.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design and assess blockchain-based solutions for tracking sustainability metrics across complex systems.

name: Human-Centered Design for Sustainable Tech

learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain the importance of inclusivity and accessibility in sustainable solution development.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply design thinking methodologies to develop user-centered, sustainability-focused digital products.

name: Digital Resilience Strategies

learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how resilience thinking strengthens sustainability initiatives.
learning_outcomes.skills: Apply resilience assessment tools to evaluate organization's capacity to withstand sustainability disruptions.

learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain connections between climate adaptation, mitigation, and digital solutions.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design digital interventions that enhance climate resilience in specific organizational contexts.

name: Digital Solutions for Social Inclusion

learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital technologies can either exacerbate or mitigate social inequalities.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design inclusive digital solutions that address social sustainability challenges.

name: Gender Equality in Digital Sustainability

learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how digital technologies can be designed to promote gender equality.

name: Integrated Sustainability Assessment

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Critically evaluate methodologies for assessing sustainability impact across environmental, social, and economic dimensions.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Analyze interconnections between the three pillars of sustainability in digital initiatives.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design and conduct integrated sustainability assessments that balance all three dimensions.

name: Sustainable Business Models for Digital Companies

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Identify sustainable business model patterns for digital products and services.
learning_outcomes.understanding: Explain how sustainability principles can be integrated into core business models.
learning_outcomes.skills: Design economically viable business models that achieve sustainability objectives.

learning_outcomes.understanding: Analyze how M-shaped professionals combine multiple specializations to address complex sustainability challenges.
